pages.title: Kinetic Damper
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Applies configurable damping to input RPM before transmitting it to the output.

pages.title: Control Panel
pages.text: Right-click with empty hand to open control panel
Redstone Panel $(br2)Configure damping coefficient through multiple channels. See general redstone panel documentation for details.
Important Notes $(li)Orientation matters! RPM transfer is unidirectional - check red triangles on block edges for flow direction.
